thread.title: Majority back McKay's sports rates bill but falls due to DUP veto (Sinn Féin)

author: wn.com
title: Majority back McKay's sports rates bill but falls due to DUP veto (Sinn Féin)
text: ( Source : Sinn Féin ) 23 October , 2015 - by Daithí McKay Sinn Féin MLA Daithí McKay has said he will not be giving up on relieving the rates burden on local amateur sports clubs. Speaking after a majority of MLAs voted for his bill to offer
